content:
/>
VIII.iv.2.D.2.f
.
Ensuring Complete Development of FPOW Claims
Since certain disorders, such as the chronic residuals of nutritional deficiency, may manifest themselves through a variety of symptoms,
ensure that examinations are complete and comprehensive, and
afford the Veteran every opportunity to present a complete and accurate picture of the POW-related disabilities.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section D - Rating Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section D
